summary: This is a stand-alone replacer follower mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/NtrTeLu.jpg[/img][/center][b][size=6]HI, everyone!![/size][/b]
First I am from Taiwan player. So my english is not very well, sorry![img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/ohdear.png[/img]
This is my first stand-alone replacer follower mod (Only above the neck). So you don't need other mods to him like my image.
And I replacer is based on my game progress.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57290-1-1408576203.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/1oEQxUc.jpg[/img]
I replacerd his hair style and face stats to make him look younger and sexy.

[b][size=6]Hope you like it...[img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/wink.gif[/img][/size][/b]

[size=2]>> Use mod of replacer:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][size=3]RaceMenu[/size][size=1] by Expired[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?][size=3]Fine Face Textures for Men[/size][size=2] by Urshi[/size][size=1] by urshi[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?][size=3]The Eyes Of Beauty[/size][size=1] by Gabriel Mailhot[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?][size=3]ApachiiSkyHair[/size][size=1] by Apachii[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21123/?][size=3]The Wilds ENB[/size][size=1] by Lunanella[/size][/url]

>> And you use my mod but into the game is grey face, try this. The steps are easy, don't wory.[img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/thumbsup.gif[/img]
YOUTUBE: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rOXF89QtgYM]Skyrim Creation kit (Custom NPC Grey Face mismatch texture bug FIX)[/url]


>> My other replacer mod, try it too.[img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/dance.gif[/img]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57183/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/LmGwkH6.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57354/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/zGHNfkE.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61689/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/Kt3poeL.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57587/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/dsL3ELv.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61835/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/hhWvoJV.png[/img][/url][/center]
